subject: SAMBA_3_0_25 is open again
body:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Heads up,

With the public release of 3.0.25-final, the SAMBA_3_0_25
branch is now back open for fixes for inclusion in 3.0.25a.
No ETA for 3.0.25a at this time.  We'll just see how 3.0.25
goes.





cheers, jerry
